item.title: 无重叠区间
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 无重叠区间 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/non-overlapping-intervals/ 利用了贪心 移除的数目就是总数目减去条件成立的数目 class Solution: def eraseOverlapIntervals(self, intervals: List[List[int]]) -> int: if len(intervals) == 0: return 0 res = 0 mins = -float("inf") for i in sorted(intervals,key=lambda i:i[1]): if i[0] >= mins: res += 1 mins = i[1] return len(intervals) - res 注
